StationAllocationAIGOA 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Stratum-level catch stats

    get.planning.data.Rd

    Planning data were generated from a schema-dependent stored procedure (STATION_PLANNING) in Oracle. Average and standard deviation of CPUE hauls for a subset of preselected species were calculated for each year and stratum id. Created 06/19/2019

    Usage

    get.planning.data(
  channel = NA,
  survey = "AI",
  schema = "AIGOA_WORK_DATA",
  pwrd = pwrd
)

    Arguments

    channel

    open connection object. Created from RODBC::odbcConnect()

    survey

    character string. Defaults to "AI" for Aleutian Islands

    schema

    character string. SQL schema name. Defaults to AIGOA_WORK_DATA

    pwrd

    character string. SQL password

    Value

    A dataframe containing:

    yearinteger. Year of survey.
    stratuminteger. Stratum id.
    species_codeinteger. Species code.
    haul_countinteger. Total number of hauls.
    cpuenumeric. Average CPUE.
    cpue_stdnumeric. Standard deviation of CPUE.

    These values inform the allocation of stations (effort) to survey strata.

    Author

    Ned Laman ned.laman@noaa.gov
